title: Start Storybook
description: Serve up storybook in development mode.

browserTarget.description: Build target to be served in project-name:builder:config format. Should generally target on the builder: '@angular-devkit/build-angular:browser'. Useful for Storybook to use options (styles, assets, ...).

staticDir.description: Directory where to load static files from, array of strings.

configDir.description: Directory where to load Storybook configurations from.

https.description: Serve Storybook over HTTPS. Note: You must provide your own certificate information.

sslCa.description: Provide an SSL certificate authority. (Optional with --https, required if using a self-signed certificate).

sslKey.description: SSL key to use for serving HTTPS.

ci.description: CI mode (skip interactive prompts, don't open browser).

docsMode.description: Starts Storybook in documentation mode. Learn more about it : https://storybook.js.org/docs/react/writing-docs/build-documentation#preview-storybooks-documentation.

compodocArgs.description: Compodoc options : https://compodoc.app/guides/options.html. Options `-p` with tsconfig path and `-d` with workspace root is always given.
